statements: SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_measurements;
SELECT employee_id, hand_length, hand_width FROM hand_geometry_measurements;
SELECT measurement_id, employee_id, hand_length, finger_length FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE hand_length > 10 AND finger_length < 5;
SELECT employee_id, hand_length FROM hand_geometry_measurements ORDER BY hand_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE hand_length > 10 ORDER BY hand_width DESC, finger_length ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT measurement_id, hand_length FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE hand_width < 5 GROUP BY measurement_id HAVING COUNT(employee_id) > 2;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(hand_length) FROM hand_geometry_measurements GROUP BY employee_id HAVING AVG(hand_length) > 8;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE hand_width BETWEEN 4 AND 6 AND hand_length < 12;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id, SUM(hand_width) FROM hand_geometry_measurements GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY SUM(hand_width) DESC;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT hand_length, hand_width FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE employee_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM employee_identities WHERE employee_id = 789;
SELECT employee_id, identity_verified FROM employee_identities WHERE identity_verified = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE hand_length > 10 AND hand_width < 5;
SELECT employee_id, hand_length, hand_width FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employee_identities WHERE identity_verified = true;
SELECT employee_id, hand_length, hand_width FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE hand_length > 10 AND hand_width < 5;
SELECT employee_id, hand_length, hand_width FROM hand_geometry_measurements ORDER BY hand_length DESC;
SELECT employee_id, hand_length, hand_width FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE hand_length < 15 OR hand_width > 6;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_measurements;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employee_identities;
SELECT hand_length, hand_width FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE hand_length > 10;
SELECT employee_id, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM sensitive_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT first_name AS employee_first_name, last_name AS employee_last_name, department AS emp_department FROM employee_identities WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE hand_length > 10 ORDER BY hand_width ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employee_identities WHERE department = 'IT' AND last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, transaction_date FROM sensitive_transactions WHERE DATE(transaction_date) = '2023-01-15' ORDER BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_measurements HGM JOIN sensitive_transactions ST ON HGM.employee_id = ST.employee_id WHERE ST.transaction_type = 'Purchase' ORDER BY HGM.hand_length DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT department, COUNT(employee_id) as employee_count FROM employee_identities GROUP BY department HAVING employee_count > 5 ORDER BY employee_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_measurements;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_information;
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM sensitive_transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT employee_name, department, hired_date FROM employee_information WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, verification_result FROM verification_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_measurements
SELECT employee_id, hand_length, finger_length FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE employee_id = 10
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM employee_information WHERE department = 'IT'
SELECT * FROM sensitive_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT employee_name, verification_result FROM employee_information INNER JOIN verification_logs ON employee_information.employee_id = verification_logs.employee_id
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_measurements;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM employee_identification WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, hand_length, hand_width FROM hand_geometry_measurements ORDER BY hand_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT employee_id, verification_result FROM hand_geometry_verification WHERE verification_result = TRUE;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM employee_identification;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM sensitive_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT employee_name, employee_role, hand_length, hand_width FROM employee_identification JOIN hand_geometry_measurements ON employee_identification.employee_id = hand_geometry_measurements.employee_id;
SELECT verification_id, verification_result FROM hand_geometry_verification WHERE employee_id = 12345;
SELECT log_date_time, log_description FROM employee_access_logs WHERE employee_id = 54321 ORDER BY log_date_time ASC;
